alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 10:44AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bradford, central Alachua, Baker, Union, northeastern Columbia and south central Charlton Counties through 1130 AM EDT... At 1044 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Needmore to Olustee to 6 miles east of Archer. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gainesville, Starke, Lake Butler, Keystone Heights, Raiford, Worthington Spring, Taylor, Alachua, Macclenny and Glen St. Mary. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Eastern Alachua; Northern Columbia; Southern Columbia; Union; Western Alachua
